price: Abõkin haɗinsa* ya ce: "Ya Ubangijinmu! Ban sanya shi girman kai ba, kuma amma ya kasance a cikin ɓata mai nĩsa."
arabic: ۞ قَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ رَبَّنَا مَآ أَطۡغَيۡتُهُۥ وَلَٰكِن كَانَ فِي ضَلَٰلِۭ بَعِيدٖ
footnotes: * Shaiɗanin da ke tãre dashi. A cikin hadĩsi an ruwaito cewa kõwa yana da Shaiɗani tãre da shi, sai dai idan ya rinjãye shi, da abin da Allah Ya aza masa, ko kuma shi sai shaiɗãnin ya rinjãye shi da bin son zũciyarsa.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla qarīnuhu rabbanā mā aṭghaytuhu walākin kāna fī ḍalālin baʿīdin
